an5.19:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an5.19:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā na sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:4.4: attanā na samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṃ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:4.5: attanā na paññāsampanno hoti, no paraṃ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:4.6: attanā na vimuttisampanno hoti, no paraṃ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:4.7: attanā na vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, no paraṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.19:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
